author: Cybernews
description:
On March 20, 2013, the city of Seoul went dark. News stations were halted, ATMS stopped working, and several websites were defaced by two mysterious hacktivist groups. The attack unfolded during a tense period between North Korea and South Korea, making the culprit seem obvious…but was it really North Korea? And perhaps most importantly, what was the true purpose of this operation: pure chaos or something more calculated?

title: How North Korea Hacked South Korea: Dark Seoul
